$interpreted: : Five years later
Devious: ──Sir Andrew's devotion to the Snake God leaves even I, a servant of our Lord, deeply moved.
Andrew: High Priest, you flatter me...
Devious: I'm sure that the God and Goddess will...
Devious: Protect Sir Andrew during this struggle for the throne!
Andrew: Thank you, High Priest. I must take my leave. Excuse me, please.
Devious: Take care of yourself, Sir Andrew.
Joshua: High Priest!
Devious: ......
Brown Nosing Cleric: Joshua, did you run away again?
Joshua: I came out to help the headmaster buy some things!
Joshua: I've kept my promise to the High Priest.
Devious: Child, is there something I can help you with?
Joshua: High Priest, it's been so long since you came to the orphanage to see us...
Joshua: The headmaster said you are very busy, but Misa, she adores the High Priest so much. She really wants to meet you...
Devious: Misa...?
Joshua: High Priest, did you forget about Misa? She's the little girl you and I took in!
Joshua: You've become so strange...
Devious: Of course I remember, the child at the orphanage! Hsss...I would love to come visit, but I have indeed been very busy recently.
Devious: I will send some people to bring gifts to the orphanage.
Joshua: But──
Devious: Take this child back to the orphanage.
Brown Nosing Cleric: Yes, sir. Joshua, come now. We must be going!
Joshua: Wait, High Priest——
Devious: Next time, don't let that dirty little demon get near me without my approval.
Devious' Aide: O-Okay...
: Three years later
Devious' Aide: High Priest, we've already prepared the "vitamins". We've mixed them in with the supplies that will be sent to the orphanage.
Devious: I see. And no one will be the wiser?
Devious' Aide: No need to worry, sir. We've staggered the time when the drugs will be administered.
Devious: If that useless idiot Andrew had not died...we wouldn't have to deal with this nonsense...
Louie: High Priest! Thank you so much for the toys!
Wendy: And those yummy yummy candies and cookies!
Devious: Hsssssss~If you are happy, then I am happy. There are even more toys at the entrance. Go pick your favorite!
Wendy: Wah! Let's go! All the good ones are gonna get taken!
Misa: High Priest...
Misa: High Priest, can you...tell me the story about the Snake God and the wall of wind?
Devious: ...Child, you must have heard these legends many times.
Misa: But Joshua said you used to always tell them stories.
Misa: I want to hear the High Priest tell a story...
Devious: (Joshua? Again with that uncleanly little demon?)
Devious: I have many important matters to attend to today. I've no time.
Devious: Hsss...however, in a few days I'll have the headmaster take you to visit the Shrine. I will tell everyone a story then.
Misa: Really!? I'm so excited!
Devious: Now you go and take a toy. If they all get taken then you won't have one, no?
Misa: I don't need a toy. Because you'll let me visit the Shrine!
Misa: Thank you!
Devious: Hssss...I hope you all...
Devious: ...can live just a little longer. That way I can see the results of the experiment~

Model.Text: Five years later
──Sir Andrew's devotion to the Snake God leaves even I, a servant of our Lord, deeply moved.
High Priest, you flatter me...
I'm sure that the God and Goddess will...
Protect Sir Andrew during this struggle for the throne!
Thank you, High Priest. I must take my leave. Excuse me, please.
Take care of yourself, Sir Andrew.
High Priest!
Joshua, did you run away again?
I came out to help the headmaster buy some things!
I've kept my promise to the High Priest.
Child, is there something I can help you with?
High Priest, it's been so long since you came to the orphanage to see us...
The headmaster said you are very busy, but Misa, she adores the High Priest so much. She really wants to meet you...
Misa...?
High Priest, did you forget about Misa? She's the little girl you and I took in!
You've become so strange...
Of course I remember, the child at the orphanage! Hsss...I would love to come visit, but I have indeed been very busy recently.
I will send some people to bring gifts to the orphanage.
But──
Take this child back to the orphanage.
Yes, sir. Joshua, come now. We must be going!
Wait, High Priest——
Next time, don't let that dirty little demon get near me without my approval.
O-Okay...
Three years later
High Priest, we've already prepared the "vitamins". We've mixed them in with the supplies that will be sent to the orphanage.
I see. And no one will be the wiser?
No need to worry, sir. We've staggered the time when the drugs will be administered.
If that useless idiot Andrew had not died...we wouldn't have to deal with this nonsense...
High Priest! Thank you so much for the toys!
And those yummy yummy candies and cookies!
Hsssssss~If you are happy, then I am happy. There are even more toys at the entrance. Go pick your favorite!
Wah! Let's go! All the good ones are gonna get taken!
High Priest...
High Priest, can you...tell me the story about the Snake God and the wall of wind?
...Child, you must have heard these legends many times.
But Joshua said you used to always tell them stories.
I want to hear the High Priest tell a story...
(Joshua? Again with that uncleanly little demon?)
I have many important matters to attend to today. I've no time.
Hsss...however, in a few days I'll have the headmaster take you to visit the Shrine. I will tell everyone a story then.
Really!? I'm so excited!
Now you go and take a toy. If they all get taken then you won't have one, no?
I don't need a toy. Because you'll let me visit the Shrine!
Thank you!
Hssss...I hope you all...
...can live just a little longer. That way I can see the results of the experiment~
